Question: Sheba Microsystems Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Sheba Microsystems Inc

Product: MEMS Autofocus Compact Camera for AR/VR/XR Headsets

- Ultra-low power sensor-shift Autofocus technology
- Unparalleled flexibility in lens design
- Compatible with large sensor formats
- Facilitates the implementation of a hybrid AF and OIS solution
- Solves the long-standing industry problem of maintaining image quality and focus stability during temperature fluctuations
- Offers evaluation kits for interested customers
- Suitable for near and far-field imaging
- Easily integrated into existing systems
- Revolutionizes the quality and capability of digital photography
